TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SdlChannelSink extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannelSinkBase, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IServerChannelSink
type SdlChannelSink = class interface IServerChannelSink interface IChannelSinkBase

summary.span: 提供在服务器上动态生成 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 的服务器信道接收器的实现。

span.span: Provides the implementation for a server channel sink that generates Web Services Description Language (WSDL) dynamically on the server.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 用于在 URL 以字符串 "？ WSDL" 结尾的情况下创建 WSDL。The is used to create WSDL in situations where the URL ends with the string "?wsdl". 下表显示了可为此信道接收器指定的信道配置属性。The following table shows the channel configuration properties that can be specified for this channel sink. 前两个属性组合用来控制应用程序域发布的对象的 WSDL 发布。The first two properties combine to control the WSDL publication of objects published by the application domain. 如果 `false` 为第一个属性指定了，则不会返回任何 WSDL，而与第二个属性无关。If `false` is specified for the first property, no WSDL is returned, regardless of the second property. （默认值为 `true` 。）否则，第二个控件会控制是否允许全局元数据对象 URI 做出响应。(The default is `true`.) Otherwise, the second controls whether the global metadata object URI is permitted to respond. （默认值为 `false`。）(The default is `false`.) |PropertyProperty|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| |`metadataEnabled`|一个布尔值，指定是否接受在此接收器位于信道接收器链中时，以 "？ wsdl" 结尾的请求。A Boolean value that specifies whether to honor requests that end in "?wsdl" if this sink is in the channel sink chain. 默认设置为 `true`。The default setting is `true`. 如果为 `false`，则只要为应用程序域中的任何对象请求元数据，接收器就会引发异常。If `false`, the sink throws an exception in all cases where metadata is requested for any object in the application domain.

在以下平台上只有 .NET Framework 1.1 版才支持该属性：Windows 98、Windows NT 4.0、Windows Millennium Edition、Windows 2000、Windows XP Home Edition、Windows XP Professional、Windows Server 2003 系列。This property is supported only by the .NET Framework version 1.1 on the following platforms: Windows 98, Windows NT 4.0, Windows Millennium Edition, Windows 2000, Windows XP Home Edition, Windows XP Professional, Windows Server 2003 family.| |`remoteApplicationMetadataEnabled`|一个布尔值，指定是否服从对象 URI "/Remoteapplicationmetadata.rem？ wsdl" 的请求，该请求将返回描述应用程序域发布的所有对象的 WSDL。A Boolean value that specifies whether to honor requests for the object URI "RemoteApplicationMetadata?wsdl", which returns WSDL that describes all objects that are published by the application domain. 如果 `false` 为，则对 "/remoteapplicationmetadata.rem" 的任何请求都将引发异常。If `false`, then any request to "RemoteApplicationMetadata.rem" throws an exception. 针对特定对象 Uri 的所有其他 "？ wsdl" 请求都是有效的。All other "?wsdl" requests for particular object URIs are honored. 如果值为 `true`，则接受全局元数据请求。If `true`, the global metadata request is honored. 默认设置为 `false`。The default setting is `false`.

在以下平台上只有 .NET Framework 1.1 版才支持该属性：Windows 98、Windows NT 4.0、Windows Millennium Edition、Windows 2000、Windows XP Home Edition、Windows XP Professional、Windows Server 2003 系列。This property is supported only by the .NET Framework version 1.1 on the following platforms: Windows 98, Windows NT 4.0, Windows Millennium Edition, Windows 2000, Windows XP Home Edition, Windows XP Professional, Windows Server 2003 family.|

span.span: XML Web Service Description

summary.span: 请求从当前接收器处理消息。

span.span: Requests message processing from the current sink.

returns.span: 状态值，提供有关如何处理消息的信息。

span.span: A status value that provides information about how the message was processed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 代理的作业是将在其上调用的方法调用转换为消息对象。The proxy's job is to convert a method call that is invoked on it into a message object. 通过调用消息接收器对象，将实现接口的 Message 对象从客户端传递到服务器端 。The Message object, which implements the interface, is passed from the client end to the server end by invoking on message sink objects. 消息接收器链接在一起，这意味着每个消息接收器负责 在下一个消息接收器完成工作后对其进行调用。Message sinks are chained together, which means that every message sink is responsible for calling on the next message sink after it has performed its work. 例如，与同步相关的消息接收器可能会导致获取或释放锁，并将锁委托给下游消息接收器。For instance, a synchronization-related message sink might cause a lock to be acquired or released and delegated to the downstream message sink. 当格式化程序信道接收器获取需要通过通道发送的消息时，它会调用并将 消息作为参数传递。When the formatter channel sink gets a message that needs to be sent over the channel, it calls , passing the message as a parameter. 然后，格式化程序接收器创建传输标头数组，并 在格式化程序接收器上调用。The formatter sink then creates the transport header array and calls on the formatter sink. 此调用沿接收器链向下转发，并且任何接收器均可创建将被传递回格式化程序接收器的请求流。This call is forwarded down the sink chain, and any sink can create a request stream that is passed back to the formatter sink. 此调用返回后，将对消息进行序列化，在 接收器链中的第一个链上调用，并将消息传递给信道接收器。After this call returns, the message is serialized, is called on the first chain in the sink chain, and the message is passed to the channel sinks. 信道接收器收到消息后，可以将数据写入流，将标头添加到标头数组，并在将调用转发到下一个接收器之前，将它们添加到接收器堆栈。After the channel sinks get the message, they can write data to the stream, add headers to the header array, and add themselves to the sink stack before forwarding the call to the next sink. 当调用到达链末尾的传输接收器时，传输接收器会将标头和序列化消息通过通道发送到服务器，在此过程中，进程会反向进行。When the call reaches the transport sink at the end of the chain, the transport sink sends the headers and serialized message over the channel to the server, where the process is reversed. 当消息到达服务器端时，传输接收器将从流中检索标头和序列化消息，并通过接收器链转发这些消息，直到它们到达格式化程序接收器。When the message reaches the server side, the transport sink retrieves the headers and serialized message from the stream and forwards these through the sink chain until they reach the formatter sink. 然后，格式化程序接收器对消息进行反序列化，并将其转发到远程处理，其中消息将被转换为方法调用并调用服务器对象。The formatter sink then deserializes the message and forwards it to remoting, where the message is turned into a method call and the server object is called.
